lines.text: Ouch! You've made me prick myself.
The latest thing is sex, religion and politics.
What swine, all of them! But my time will come.
Getting married to Gianni was like getting married in a film.
I was thinking of eternal love, all he wanted was an affair with a film star. And he got it.
I'm desperate. I have nothing left, and I'm only 22.
There's Clara Manni! She's beautiful, if only she could act, too.
